Differentiating a function
==========================================

This section corresponds to question 5 of the Coursework.

Goal
----------------------------------------
The code provided aims to compare the derivative of the function The function is defined as :math:`f(x) = \log(\sin(x)) + x^2 \cos(x)`.

1-Automatic differentiation using dual numbers

2-Analytic method

3-Numerical method


Details
----------------------------------------

    :members:
    :undoc-members:
